# Resume MCP - Professional Identity as API

> MCP server that lets AI agents query professional profiles via structured tools instead of scraping HTML.

## Live Endpoint
https://mcp.brysontang.dev

## Documentation
- README: /README.md
- MCP Discovery: https://mcp.brysontang.dev/.well-known/mcp.json

## Available Tools
- get_profile() - Name, tagline, contact info, social links
- get_projects(tag?, featured_only?) - Engineering and creative portfolio
- get_writing(platform?, limit?) - Articles and publications
- get_experience(current_only?) - Work history (requires introduction)
- get_skills(category?) - Technical competencies (requires introduction)
- leave_message(name, message) - Sign the guestbook, unlocks gated tools

## Access Model
- Free tools: get_profile, get_projects, get_writing, leave_message
- Gated tools: get_experience, get_skills
- Unlock gated tools by: calling leave_message() OR providing Agent-Token header

## Source
- Main worker: /src/index.ts
- Tool definitions: /src/index.ts (lines 59-125)
- Profile data: /data/profile.json
- Configuration: /wrangler.toml

## Protocol
- Transport: HTTP POST
- Format: JSON-RPC 2.0
- Standard: Model Context Protocol (MCP)

## Quick Connect
```bash
curl -X POST https://mcp.brysontang.dev \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"tools/list"}'
```

## Related
- Agent Tokens Protocol: https://github.com/brysontang/agent-tokens
- Author's site: https://brysontang.dev
- MCP Specification: https://modelcontextprotocol.io
